name: Erroneous
body:
# Erroneous Erroneous is a Ruby on Rails view helper that creates simple markup for inline errors. ## Requirements The gem is tested with: * Ruby on Rails 3.1.1 * Ruby (MRI) 1.9.3 (p0) * Ruby (MRI) 1.9.2 (p290) * Ruby (MRI) 1.8.7 (p352) * Ruby (REE) 1.8.7 (2011.03) * JRuby 1.6.5 * Rubinius 1.2.4 ## Installation gem install erroneous ## Examples <%= errors @user, :name %>
can't be blank
<%= errors @user, :phone %>
can't be blank and should look like a phone number
<%= errors @user, :email %>
can't be blank and should look like an email address
## Copyright Copyright (c) 2010 - 2012 Kevin Sylvestre. See LICENSE for details.
tagline: A view helper that creates simple markup for inline errors
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
